Title: Provides that school districts, including the city school district of the city of New York, are entitled to an apportionment of state aid for the closure of schools due in response to the novel coronavirus
Summary: Provides that school districts, including the city school district of the city of New York, are entitled to an apportionment of state aid for the closure of schools due in response to the novel coronavirus.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the attendance of minors upon full day instruction and the conditions under which districts, including the city school district of the city of New York, are entitled to an apportionment of state aid and the closure of schools due in response to the novel coronavirus, COVID-19
